ChangeRoyalHeir.questDescriptionRules.ru.li:
questDescription->
In order to consecrate making [titleHeir_nameFull] the heir of [titleHolder_nameFull]'s title, you must build a monument.

The monument will be [monumentSize] in size and will require these resources (total value [monumentRequiredResourcesMarketValue_money]):

[monumentRequiredResources]

Failing to finish the monument within 20 days is considered to profane the ritual. Your relations with [asker_factionName] will fall by 25, and the heir will not be changed.

If the monument is destroyed within [keepMonumentTicks_duration] days after completion, your relations with [asker_factionName] will fall by [goodwillChangeIfMonumentDestroyed].

LanguageData.ChangeRoyalHeir.LetterLabelAskerOffended: [asker_nameDef](은)는 새로이 계승하겠다고 약속했지만, 제한된 시간내에 기념비를 건설하지 못해 불쾌감을 느낍니다.\n\n[asker_faction_name] 세력과의 우호도가 -25 떨어집니다.
LanguageData.ChangeRoyalHeir.LetterTextMonumentDestro: [asker_nameDef](은)는 (은)는 당신이 작위를 계승하겠다고 약속했음에도 기념비가 완공되자마자 파괴한 것에 대해 불쾌해 합니다.\n\n[asker_faction_name](와)과의 우호도가 [goodwillChangeIfMonumentDestroyed] 감소합니다.
